place.name: WHITTINGHAME
place.gazetteerText: Whittinghame, par., Haddingtonshire, 15,595 ac., pop. 639; P.O.; Whittlnghame House, seat, is on Whittinghame Water, 3 miles SE. of East Linton; the ruins of Whittlnghame Castle are in the vicinity. (In 1887, John Bartholomew's Gazetteer of the British Isles)
